explore.description: Curiosity-driven exploration of Bennu metagenomic data. Find surprising loci, test hypotheses, build narratives. Use with --focus metabolism|phage|defense|novel

survey.description: Systematic, comprehensive survey with rigorous documentation. Produces genome profiles, findings.jsonl, figures, and final report.

literature.description: Search scientific literature for information about proteins, domains, pathways. Usage: /literature DUF3683

q.description: Quick ad-hoc query. Fast answers, no ceremony. Usage: /q giant unannotated proteins

characterize.description: Deep characterization pipeline for unknown proteins: context + structure + foldseek + literature â†’ hypothesis

pathway.description: Check metabolic pathway completeness using KEGG annotations. Usage: /pathway Wood-Ljungdahl

defense.description: Analyze defense systems: CRISPR-Cas, R-M, toxin-antitoxin, anti-phage mechanisms

compare.description: Comparative genomics between genomes or groups. Usage: /compare GENOME_A GENOME_B

metabolism.description: Analyze energy and carbon metabolism: hydrogenases, electron transport, carbon fixation, fermentation
